update member_lesson
club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time_1 = #{startTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time_1 = #{endTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
